summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeJust in time for Summer, Lanolips is launching its new untinted SPF 30 lip balm, perfect for fun in the sun.
details: DetailsBenefitsLanolips cult lanolin balm-base, with added golden shimmer for a subtle sun-glowAn all-natural base plus UVA & UVB filters (nonnatural)100% natural fragrance, smells like pineapple and the beachFeaturesFemale-Owned Beauty BrandFormulated WithoutArtificial ColorsPthalatesPetrolatumPEGsMineral OilItem 2636975How To UseApply to lips.For external use only.IngredientsActive Ingredients: Avobenzone 3 %, Octinoxate 4 %, Octocrylene 2.7 %, Oxybenzone 3 %Inactive Ingredients: Lanolin, theobroma cacao (cocoa) seed butter*, ricinus communis (castor) seed oil*, cera alba (beeswax)*, butyrospermum parkii (shea) butter*, aroma (flavor)*, vitis vinifera (grape) seed oil*, mica*, tocopherol (vit E)*, glycine soja (soybean) oil*, cocos nucifera (coconut) oil*, vegetable oil*, prunus amygdalus dulcis (sweet almond) oil*, CI 77891 (titanium dioxide), CI 77491 (iron oxides) *naturally derived
how_to_use: Apply to lips.For external use only.

reviews.headline: A little bit goes a long way
reviews.comments: Love the glossiness

reviews.headline: Hydrating & no cast!
reviews.comments: I only tried this once but I have no complaints. This will def be my go-to next summer!

reviews.headline: Finally!
reviews.comments: I've been waiting for an SPF version for so long, I'm so glad it's finally here! It smells delightful and feels no different than the classic balms. More flavors, please!

reviews.headline: Finally a clear SPF lip balm that doesn't taste awful
reviews.comments: SPF 30, super moisturizing, no weird taste? this is my favorite clear SPF lip product I've tried by far.

reviews.headline: Best SPF lip balm I've ever used
reviews.comments: This is hands down the best SPF lip balm I've ever used. Extremely moisturizing, lasts a VERY long time on your lips, and most importantly, it doesn't have a gross chemical taste! Lanolips is a great brand and I am very happy with this purchase.

reviews.headline: LOVE!
reviews.comments: The cutest lip balm! Keeps my lips hydrated during the hot summer and protects them with the added spf

reviews.headline: Go buy it
reviews.comments: Very good definetly worth your money

reviews.headline: Must have for day at the beach
reviews.comments: This is a must have for the beach! We vacation at the beach every year. My lips always get sun and wind burned. This year they did not, thanks to this spf lanolips! I dont like strong tastes or smells. This has neither. Its thicker, so inwouodnt wear it as everyday, but on beach or baseball days, it is my new go to!

reviews.headline: Leaves lips feeling lovely
reviews.comments: I do love how this product makes my lips feel and its definitely a bonus that it contains sunscreen. Its like my preventative care for when im out and about but i wouldnt use around the time when im drinking or eating because you can taste sunscreen.

reviews.headline: So Great
reviews.comments: This is sn amazing,glossy lip balm. Its thick but spreads nicely and has SPF so my lips are protected and shiny.

reviews.headline: the best spf i have used on my lips !
reviews.comments: love love love this product ! always looking for a good sun protectant for my lips, not so much a chapstick person like a balm better so this is perfect. the scent is amazing & its so hydrating! cant wait to buy more products from lanolips.

reviews.headline: Love lanolips
reviews.comments: It help me with my dry lips and chapped life saver

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: My new favorite SPF lip product. I've never bought from Lanolips before but was at Ulta looking for an SPF lip balm to go to the pool and this was the only squeeze tube I could find (I didn't want a lip balm stick because they melt). This stuff was a GREAT choice! It tastes slightly like sunscreen but that doesn't bother me at all. It feels very moisturizing while looking somewhat glossy, kind of like the Aquaphor or Glossier clear lip balms, which I love the look of on my lips. I will be using this year round, in and out of the sun, and I will be buying more Lanolips products. I don't know why this product is not talked about more!

reviews.headline: Tastes like sunscreen :/
reviews.comments: I'm on the hunt for protective lip products that don't taste like sunscreen and was really hoping this one would deliver but it's a resounding meh. It's very comfortable on the lips and initially smells great and isn't overwhelmingly sunscreeny, but as it wears and as I drink from my water bottle etc, it becomes very sunscreeny and makes everything I eat or drink have a tinge of sunscreen too.

reviews.headline: Love!
reviews.comments: I have always loved Lanolips lip balms. They arent sticky and have a nice balmy shine. I was excited for this one with spf and it didn't disappoint. I absolutely hate the sunscreen smell and taste. Ya know that chemically taste you can't get out of your mouth?? This does NOT have it. I'm not sure what others are tasting or smelling but the tube that I bought has zero taste. It smells a little cake-ish to me. It has a little shimmer in this formula but its minimal and so pretty. A great addition to my pool/beach bag!

reviews.headline: Sun protected pout
reviews.comments: Super hydrating lip balm. I live in miami so this is a daily must for me. My lips feel nourished and protected.

reviews.headline: adorable
reviews.comments: love this product! i want every lanolips item now.

reviews.headline: perfect!
reviews.comments: love all lanolips productsâ€” love how this one has a little shimmer and spf!

reviews.headline: Love Lanolips
reviews.comments: I was excited to see the sun balm come out. I've used Lanolips for years- all different varieties, and they've all been good. Super staying power, soft-gloss finish, and no weird taste. It's a keeper for my beach/lake bag.

reviews.headline: SPF yes please!
reviews.comments: Love that they came out with an SPF product. My favorite now. It's thin, easy to apply, not sticky, shimmery, and long lasting. I don't understand all the hate about the smell and taste, its not mesnt to smell and taste good, its meant to hydrate and protect your lips

faceoff_positive.comments: My new favorite SPF lip product. I've never bought from Lanolips before but was at Ulta looking for an SPF lip balm to go to the pool and this was the only squeeze tube I could find (I didn't want a lip balm stick because they melt). This stuff was a GREAT choice! It tastes slightly like sunscreen but that doesn't bother me at all. It feels very moisturizing while looking somewhat glossy, kind of like the Aquaphor or Glossier clear lip balms, which I love the look of on my lips. I will be using this year round, in and out of the sun, and I will be buying more Lanolips products. I don't know why this product is not talked about more!
faceoff_positive.headline: Love it

faceoff_negative.comments: I'm on the hunt for protective lip products that don't taste like sunscreen and was really hoping this one would deliver but it's a resounding meh. It's very comfortable on the lips and initially smells great and isn't overwhelmingly sunscreeny, but as it wears and as I drink from my water bottle etc, it becomes very sunscreeny and makes everything I eat or drink have a tinge of sunscreen too.
faceoff_negative.headline: Tastes like sunscreen :/
